description:
• Team name:

Team Miami

  • Game info:

KOI is a game created by a group of 5 game development students. It is a runner game in which you will have to overcome different obstacles on your way to the top of Mount Fuji.

Our game is a metaphor for the cycle of life, represented by 3 levels (Spring Level, Autumn Level, and Spirit Level). After each level, you will have to decide if you are going to continue the trip by yourself or you rather stop and be part of something else.

  • How to play:

At the start of the game, you will control a carp with 3 stats: Size, Velocity and Health, all of them with random values.

Your mission is to avoid the obstacles and reach the lake at the end of each river section. There, you will have to decide whether to continue or reproduce with another carp to improve your stats. If you choose to reproduce you will restart the game with your child. If you die with a Gen. 3 child, you will respawn with a random Gen. 1 carp with random stats.

    - River controls:

        - Move the carp: A / D

        - Dive:  Left Shift

    - Lake controls:

        - Move and Select : Left Click Mouse

    - General:

        - Pause: Esc
